displayName: Power BI REST API Integration Server
description: Enable AI assistants to manage and interact with Microsoft Power BI resources such as workspaces, reports, dashboards, datasets, and more through a unified interface. Perform advanced operations including exporting reports, executing DAX queries, and generating embed tokens. Access any Power BI or Microsoft Graph API endpoint dynamically for complete API flexibility.

GRAPH_CLIENT_ID.description: Microsoft Graph API OAuth 2.0 client ID (optional, for OAuth authentication)

GRAPH_TENANT_ID.description: Microsoft Graph API OAuth 2.0 tenant ID (optional, for OAuth authentication)

GRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Microsoft Graph API access token (optional, for Graph API operations)

GRAPH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Microsoft Graph API OAuth 2.0 client secret (optional, for OAuth authentication)

POWERBI_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Power BI access token for API authentication
